contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox Belgium Municipality |name=Ravels |picture= |picture-legend= |map=RavelsLocatie.png |map-legend=Location of Ravels in the province of Antwerp |arms=Ravels wapen.gif |flag=Flag of Ravels.svg |region={{BE-REG-FLE}} |community={{BE-NL}} |province={{BE-PROV-AN}} |arrondissement=[[Arrondissement of Turnhout|Turnhout]] |nis=13035 |pyramid-date= |0-19= |20-64= |65= |foreigners= |foreigners-date= |mayor=Leo Van Nooten ([[CD&V]]) |majority=[[CD&V]] |postal-codes=2380-2382 |telephone-area=014 |web=[http://www.ravels.be www.ravels.be] |lat_deg=51 |lat_min=22 |lon_deg=05 |lon_min=00 }} '''Ravels''' is a [[municipality]] located in the [[Belgium|Belgian]] province of [[Antwerp (province)|Antwerp]]. The municipality comprises the towns of [[Poppel]], Ravels proper and [[Weelde]]. On January 1, 2006 Ravels had a total population of 13,762. The total area is 94.99 km² which gives a [[population density]] of 145 inhabitants per km². A large proportion of its inhabitants are immigrants from The Netherlands. ==References== {{reflist}} ==External links== *{{Commons category-inline}} *[http://www.ravels.be Official website] ([[Dutch language|Dutch]]) {{Geographic location | Centre = Ravels | North = [[Goirle]] ([[Netherlands|NL]]-[[North Brabant|NB]]) | Northeast = [[Hilvarenbeek]] ([[Netherlands|NL]]-[[North Brabant|NB]]) | East = [[Reusel-De Mierden]] ([[Netherlands|NL]]-[[North Brabant|NB]]) | Southeast = [[Arendonk]] | South = [[Turnhout]], [[Oud-Turnhout]] | West = [[Baarle-Nassau]] ([[Netherlands|NL]]-[[North Brabant|NB]]) | Northwest = [[Alphen-Chaam]] ([[Netherlands|NL]]-[[North Brabant|NB]]) }} {{Antwerpen_Belgium}} [[Category:Municipalities of Antwerp (province)]] {{Antwerp-geo-stub}}
